fields.name: street
fields.description: Street address line.

fields.name: city
fields.description: City or town name.

fields.name: state
fields.description: State, province, or region.

fields.name: postal_code
fields.description: Postal or ZIP code.

fields.name: country
fields.description: Country name or code.

fields.name: latitude
fields.description: Latitude value of the location.

fields.name: longitude
fields.description: Longitude value of the location.

fields.name: altitude
fields.description: Altitude or elevation above sea level.

fields.name: email
fields.description: Email address for contact.

fields.name: phone
fields.description: Primary phone number.

fields.name: alternate_phone
fields.description: Alternate or mobile phone number.

fields.name: alternate_email
fields.description: Secondary email address.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the contact.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Full name of the contact person.

fields.name: organization
fields.description: Associated organization or company.

fields.name: title
fields.description: Job title or role of the contact.

fields.name: contact_info
fields.description: Contact details such as phone and email.

fields.name: address
fields.description: Physical mailing address of the contact.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the user.

fields.name: username
fields.description: Login username for the user.

fields.name: password
fields.description: Password (hashed) for authentication.

fields.name: email
fields.description: Email address of the user.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Full name of the user.

fields.name: role
fields.description: Role or access level assigned to the user.

fields.name: profile
fields.description: Detailed profile information of the user.

fields.name: first_name
fields.description: First (given) name of the user.

fields.name: last_name
fields.description: Last (family) name of the user.

fields.name: date_of_birth
fields.description: Birth date of the user.

fields.name: bio
fields.description: Short biography or personal description.

fields.name: profile_picture_url
fields.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

fields.name: address
fields.description: Residential or mailing address of the user.

fields.name: contact_info
fields.description: Contact details like phone and secondary email.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the role.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the role (e.g., admin, user, guest).

fields.name: permissions
fields.description: List of permissions or actions allowed.

fields.name: description
fields.description: Description of the role's purpose or scope.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the organization.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the organization or company.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type or category of organization (e.g., nonprofit, corporation).

fields.name: industry
fields.description: Industry or sector the organization belongs to.

fields.name: address
fields.description: Registered address of the organization.

fields.name: contact_info
fields.description: General contact details for the organization.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the team.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the team or group.

fields.name: members
fields.description: List of users who are members of the team.

fields.name: lead
fields.description: User who leads or manages the team.

fields.name: description
fields.description: Brief description or purpose of the team.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the product.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the product.

fields.name: description
fields.description: Detailed description of the product.

fields.name: price
fields.description: Price of the product.

fields.name: currency
fields.description: Currency for the product price (e.g., USD).

fields.name: category
fields.description: Category or type of product.

fields.name: sku
fields.description: Stock keeping unit identifier for the product.

fields.name: in_stock
fields.description: Availability of the product (true if in stock).

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the inventory entry.

fields.name: product
fields.description: Product associated with this inventory entry.

fields.name: location
fields.description: Location or warehouse for this inventory stock.

fields.name: quantity
fields.description: Quantity of the product available at this location.

fields.name: last_restock_date
fields.description: Date when the stock was last restocked or updated.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the shopping cart.

fields.name: user
fields.description: User who owns this cart.

fields.name: items
fields.description: List of items currently in the cart.

fields.name: total
fields.description: Total price of all items in the cart.

fields.name: currency
fields.description: Currency of the cart's total price.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the order.

fields.name: date
fields.description: Date and time when the order was placed.

fields.name: customer
fields.description: User or customer who placed the order.

fields.name: items
fields.description: List of items included in the order.

fields.name: shipping_address
fields.description: Shipping address where the order will be delivered.

fields.name: billing_address
fields.description: Billing address for the order.

fields.name: total_amount
fields.description: Total monetary amount of the order.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Current status of the order (e.g., pending, shipped, delivered).

fields.name: payment_method
fields.description: Payment method used for the order.

fields.name: product
fields.description: Product that was ordered.

fields.name: quantity
fields.description: Quantity of the product ordered.

fields.name: price
fields.description: Price per unit of the product at the time of order.

fields.name: total
fields.description: Total price for this item (price * quantity).

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the payment method.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of payment method (e.g., credit_card, paypal, bank_transfer).

fields.name: card_number
fields.description: Card or account number (e.g., credit card number).

fields.name: expiration_date
fields.description: Expiration date of the card (if applicable).

fields.name: cardholder_name
fields.description: Name on the card or account.

fields.name: billing_address
fields.description: Billing address associated with this payment method.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the payment transaction.

fields.name: amount
fields.description: Amount that was paid in the transaction.

fields.name: currency
fields.description: Currency of the payment (e.g., USD, EUR).

fields.name: date
fields.description: Date and time when the payment was made.

fields.name: method
fields.description: Payment method or instrument used.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Status of the payment (e.g., completed, pending, failed).

fields.name: order
fields.description: Order associated with this payment.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Invoice identifier or number.

fields.name: issue_date
fields.description: Date when the invoice was issued.

fields.name: due_date
fields.description: Date by which payment is due.

fields.name: customer
fields.description: Customer or client being billed.

fields.name: line_items
fields.description: Items or services listed on the invoice.

fields.name: total_amount
fields.description: Total amount to be paid.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Payment status of the invoice (e.g., unpaid, paid, past_due).

fields.name: payment_terms
fields.description: Payment terms or notes (e.g., Net 30).

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the subscription.

fields.name: user
fields.description: User or customer who is subscribed.

fields.name: plan_name
fields.description: Name of the subscription plan.

fields.name: start_date
fields.description: Date when the subscription started.

fields.name: end_date
fields.description: Date when the subscription ends or renews.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Status of the subscription (e.g., active, canceled, expired).

fields.name: auto_renew
fields.description: Whether the subscription auto-renews.

fields.name: id

fields.name: name

fields.description: Detailed description of the event.

fields.description: Date and time when the event takes place.

fields.name: venue
fields.description: Venue or location details for the event.

fields.name: capacity
fields.description: Maximum number of attendees for the event.

fields.name: attendees_count
fields.description: Number of attendees registered for the event.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the venue.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the venue or location.

fields.name: address
fields.description: Address of the venue.

fields.name: capacity
fields.description: Maximum capacity of the venue.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of venue (e.g., auditorium, stadium, online platform).

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the ticket.

fields.name: event
fields.description: Event for which this ticket is valid.

fields.name: attendee
fields.description: User or person who holds the ticket.

fields.name: seat_number
fields.description: Seat number or location assigned to the ticket.

fields.name: price
fields.description: Price paid for the ticket.

fields.name: purchase_date
fields.description: Date and time when the ticket was purchased.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the support ticket.

fields.name: customer
fields.description: User or customer who reported the issue.

fields.name: subject
fields.description: Short summary of the issue or request.

fields.name: description
fields.description: Detailed description of the problem or request.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Current status of the ticket (e.g., open, in_progress, resolved).

fields.name: priority
fields.description: Priority level of the ticket (e.g., low, medium, high).

fields.name: created_at
fields.description: Time when the ticket was created.

fields.name: updated_at
fields.description: Time of the last update on the ticket.

fields.name: assigned_to
fields.description: Support agent or team member handling the ticket.

fields.name: student

fields.name: grade_value

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the message.

fields.name: sender
fields.description: User or entity who sent the message.

fields.description: User or entity who is intended to receive the message.

fields.name: content
fields.description: Text content of the message.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: Date and time when the message was sent.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of message (e.g., chat, email, SMS).

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the notification.

fields.name: user
fields.description: User who receives the notification.

fields.name: message

fields.name: type
fields.description: Notification type (e.g., email, SMS, push).

fields.name: created_at
fields.description: Time when the notification was created.

fields.name: read
fields.description: Whether the notification has been read.

fields.name: content
fields.description: Text content of the comment.

fields.name: posted_at
fields.description: Date and time when the comment was posted.

fields.description: Identifier of the entity this comment is related to (e.g., post ID).

fields.name: author
fields.description: User or customer who wrote the review.

fields.name: rating
fields.description: Rating score given in the review (e.g., 1-5).

fields.description: Text content of the review.

fields.name: date
fields.description: Date when the review was submitted.

fields.name: item
fields.description: Product or item that is being reviewed.

fields.name: title

fields.name: content

fields.name: author
fields.description: Author who wrote the article.

fields.name: tags
fields.description: List of tags or categories for the article.

fields.description: Date and time when the article was published.

fields.name: updated_at
fields.description: Date and time of the last update to the article.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the file.

fields.name: filename
fields.description: Name of the file including extension.

fields.description: File format or MIME type (e.g., PDF, JPEG).

fields.description: Size of the file in bytes.

fields.description: URL or storage path where the file is accessible.

fields.description: Due date for the task completion.

fields.description: Timestamp when the task was created.
